import sys
sys.stdout.reconfigure\(encoding=""utf-8""\)

from docx import Document

doc = Document\(r""d:\\WORK\\kinhdoanh\\baogia\\LG\\Bảng báo giá máy giặt sấy Chí Vĩ.docx""\)

print\(""=== DOCUMENT STRUCTURE ===""\)
for i, section in enumerate\(doc.sections\):
    print\(f""Page: {section.page_width.cm:.1f} x {section.page_height.cm:.1f} cm""\)
    print\(f""Margins L/R/T/B: {section.left_margin.cm:.1f}/{section.right_margin.cm:.1f}/{section.top_margin.cm:.1f}/{section.bottom_margin.cm:.1f} cm""\)

print\(""\\n=== PARAGRAPHS ===""\)
for i, para in enumerate\(doc.paragraphs\):
    if para.text.strip\(\):
        alignment = para.alignment.name if para.alignment else ""None""
        print\(f""P{i}: [{alignment}] {para.text[:80]}""\)

print\(""\\n=== TABLES ===""\)
for t_idx, table in enumerate\(doc.tables\):
    print\(f""\\nTable {t_idx}: {len\(table.rows\)} rows x {len\(table.columns\)} cols""\)
    for r_idx, row in enumerate\(table.rows\):
        row_text = []
        for cell in row.cells:
            text = cell.text.replace\(chr\(10\), "" ""\)[:35]
            row_text.append\(text\)
        print\(f""  R{r_idx}: {row_text}""\)
''@}")
